Operation 'post_/api/pricing-hub/prices' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary 'Retrieve prices' is too generic and doesn't convey the full action (calculation and application). Description lacks clarity on what is returned and how this operation interacts with the pricing system configuration. Added specificity about cart context, return values, and relationship to external pricing configuration to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
> This API has been deprecated. If you need to associate prices with specific customers, we recommend using the [Audience API](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/audience-api).
 
This route retrieves and applies prices for the items that are passed in the request. Pricing Hub will select the pricing method that will be used for each item and will fetch their respective price from the selected pricing method.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate and retrieve prices for cart items
data.description_suggestion:
**DEPRECATED** - Use the Audience API for customer-specific pricing instead.

Calculates and retrieves prices for items in a shopping cart by querying the configured external pricing system or internal pricing method. Pricing Hub evaluates each item and applies the appropriate pricing method based on store configuration. Returns pricing data for all items in the request. This operation integrates with external pricing APIs configured via the external price source endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Retrieve prices' is too generic and doesn't convey the full action (calculation and application). Description lacks clarity on what is returned and how this operation interacts with the pricing system configuration. Added specificity about cart context, return values, and relationship to external pricing configuration to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'ConfigExternalPriceSource' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary lacks action clarity - doesn't specify that this both configures AND controls activation. Description is vague about what configuration parameters are required and what the side effects are. Added details about endpoint configuration, activation/deactivation mechanics, and immediate effect on pricing operations to help AI agents understand when and how to use this configuration endpoint.

data.current_description:
> This API has been deprecated. If you need to associate prices with customers, we recommend using the [Audience API](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/audience-api).
 
This route facilitates setting up an external price source in Pricing Hub. It also allows you to activate or deactivate that source in a given account.
data.summary_suggestion: Configure and enable external pricing system
data.description_suggestion:
**DEPRECATED** - Use the Audience API for customer-specific pricing instead.

Configures an external price source for Pricing Hub integration and controls its activation status. Allows you to specify the external pricing system endpoint and toggle the pricing source between active and inactive states for the account. The configured external pricing system will be queried by Pricing Hub when calculating prices for cart items. Changes take effect immediately for subsequent pricing requests.
data.reasoning: Original summary lacks action clarity - doesn't specify that this both configures AND controls activation. Description is vague about what configuration parameters are required and what the side effects are. Added details about endpoint configuration, activation/deactivation mechanics, and immediate effect on pricing operations to help AI agents understand when and how to use this configuration endpoint.
